report.description:
This report can be used by the financial development department to see how much donations have come in for the local field, and which money will be forwarded to local and remote projects.

queryDetail.value: SELECT DISTINCT motivation.a_account_code_c AS Account, account.a_account_code_short_desc_c AS AccountName FROM PUB_a_motivation_detail AS motivation, PUB_a_account as account WHERE motivation.a_ledger_number_i = {{param_ledger_number_i}} AND motivation.a_receipt_l = TRUE AND account.a_ledger_number_i = motivation.a_ledger_number_i AND account.a_account_code_c = motivation.a_account_code_c ORDER BY Account, AccountName

SELECT DISTINCT motivation.a_motivation_group_code_c AS MotivationGroup FROM PUB_a_motivation_detail AS motivation WHERE motivation.a_ledger_number_i = {{param_ledger_number_i}} AND motivation.a_receipt_l = TRUE ORDER BY MotivationGroup

queryDetail.value: SELECT motivation.a_motivation_group_code_c AS MotivationGroup, motivation.a_motivation_detail_code_c AS MotivationDetail, motivation.a_account_code_c AS Account, account.a_account_code_short_desc_c AS AccountName, SUM(detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS AmountYTD FROM PUB_a_gift_detail AS detail, PUB_a_gift_batch as batch, PUB_a_motivation_detail AS motivation, PUB_a_cost_centre AS costcentre, PUB_a_account AS account WHERE batch.a_ledger_number_i = {{param_ledger_number_i}} AND batch.a_batch_status_c = 'Posted' AND batch.a_gl_effective_date_d BETWEEN {#param_start_date_ytd#} AND {#param_end_date#} AND detail.a_ledger_number_i = batch.a_ledger_number_i AND detail.a_batch_number_i = batch.a_batch_number_i AND motivation.a_ledger_number_i = detail.a_ledger_number_i AND motivation.a_motivation_group_code_c = detail.a_motivation_group_code_c AND motivation.a_motivation_detail_code_c = detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c AND ( detail.a_recipient_ledger_number_n =

OR detail.a_recipient_ledger_number_n = 0) AND account.a_ledger_number_i = motivation.a_ledger_number_i AND account.a_account_code_c = motivation.a_account_code_c AND costcentre.a_ledger_number_i = detail.a_ledger_number_i AND costcentre.a_cost_centre_code_c = detail.a_cost_centre_code_c AND (detail.a_cost_centre_code_c LIKE '{{param_ledger_number_i}}%' OR costcentre.a_cost_centre_to_report_to_c LIKE '{{param_ledger_number_i}}%') AND motivation.a_receipt_l = TRUE
GROUP BY motivation.a_motivation_group_code_c, motivation.a_motivation_detail_code_c, motivation.a_account_code_c, account.a_account_code_short_desc_c
